title: USGS Maps Out Fresh Oil and Gas Potential in the Rockies
summary: Northwest Colorado and southwest Wyoming have an estimated 3 million barrels of oil and 666 billion cubic feet of gas that are recoverable, the United States Geological Survey (USGS) said in a recent assessment.
fullContent: Northwest Colorado and southwest Wyoming have an estimated 3 million barrels of oil and 666 billion cubic feet of gas that are recoverable, the United States Geological Survey (USGS) said in a recent assessment. The Phosphoria Total Petroleum System, which has been producing oil and gas since 1920, has pumped a total of 500 million barrels of oil and 2.5 trillion cubic feet of natural gas over the past 100 years, according to the USGS estimates. The system may be nearing depletion, the USGS assessment found, despite the volumes of still recoverable…

fullContent: Seven major insurers, including AIA, AXA and HSBC Life, on Monday signed a pledge and joined a Hong Kong Insurance Authority programme to promote the adoption of artificial intelligence in the sector to enhance the city as a regional AI hub. title: State-run telco MTNL defaults on loan repayments worth 87 billion rupees
summary: Mahanagar Telephone Nigam Ltd (MTNL) has defaulted on loan repayments of 86.59 billion rupees to seven public sector banks, adding to its financial woes. The default includes principal and overdue interest to lenders like Union Bank of India and State Bank of India.
fullContent: Mahanagar Telephone Nigam Ltd (MTNL) has defaulted on loan repayments of 86.59 billion rupees to seven public sector banks, adding to its financial woes. The default includes principal and overdue interest to lenders like Union Bank of India and State Bank of India. Burdened by falling subscribers and mounting losses, MTNL's total debt has risen to 345.77 billion rupees.

title: Vikram Solar IPO: GMP falls to 17% ahead of Tuesday launch. Check details
summary: Vikram Solar has fixed its IPO price band at Rs 315–332 per share. The issue comprises a fresh issue of up to Rs 1,500 crore along with an offer-for-sale of 1.74 crore shares by existing shareholders. At the upper end of the band, the offer-for-sale amounts to Rs 579.
fullContent: Vikram Solar has fixed its IPO price band at Rs 315–332 per share. The issue comprises a fresh issue of up to Rs 1,500 crore along with an offer-for-sale of 1.74 crore shares by existing shareholders. At the upper end of the band, the offer-for-sale amounts to Rs 579.36 crore, bringing the total IPO size to Rs 2,079.36 crore.

title: Gold falls below Rs 1 lakh, trades near two-week low. Analysts predict further downside
summary: Gold fell below Rs 1 lakh, trading at Rs 99,860 per 10 grams on MCX, as analysts cited easing global tensions, dovish Fed cues, and US-Ukraine talks, predicting further downside toward $3,300 (around Rs 97,500) with resistance near $3,445 (around Rs 1,00,500).
fullContent: Gold fell below Rs 1 lakh, trading at Rs 99,860 per 10 grams on MCX, as analysts cited easing global tensions, dovish Fed cues, and US-Ukraine talks, predicting further downside toward $3,300 (around Rs 97,500) with resistance near $3,445 (around Rs 1,00,500).

title: GST cuts: A consumption boost or a capex setback? Venugopal Garre weighs in
summary: A potential GST cut could inject $13 billion into consumption, but Bernstein's Venugopal Garre cautions it may hinder government capital expenditure, particularly in transportation. While consumer demand might see a temporary surge, private sector investment is unlikely to...
fullContent: A potential GST cut could inject $13 billion into consumption, but Bernstein's Venugopal Garre cautions it may hinder government capital expenditure, particularly in transportation. While consumer demand might see a temporary surge, private sector investment is unlikely to follow suit, keeping Nifty earnings growth moderate.

title: I drove Tesla's first car, the 2008 Roadster. It was one of the most fun EVs I've driven in years — and I got a bicep workout.
summary: Andrew Lambrecht was offered a chance to drive a 2008 Tesla Roadster, estimated to be worth around $150,000. He said it came with a bicep workout.
fullContent: Andrew Lambrecht was offered a chance to drive a 2008 Tesla Roadster, estimated to be worth around $150,000. He said it came with a bicep workout.

title: Sources: the EU and US are delaying formalizing their trade deal over "non-tariff barriers", including relaxing the DSA, which the EU sees as a red line (Financial Times)
summary: Financial Times: Sources: the EU and US are delaying formalizing their trade deal over "non-tariff barriers", including relaxing the DSA, which the EU sees as a red line — Document formalising last month's deal delayed by squabbles over language on 'non-tariff barriers',...
fullContent: Financial Times: Sources: the EU and US are delaying formalizing their trade deal over "non-tariff barriers", including relaxing the DSA, which the EU sees as a red line — Document formalising last month's deal delayed by squabbles over language on 'non-tariff barriers', bloc's officials say

title: Mark Zuckerberg rankles neighbors for buying up cluster of Palo Alto homes
summary: In the years since buying his first home there, Zuckerberg has purchased 10 others in an apparent bid to create a kind of property buffer.
fullContent: In the years since buying his first home there, Zuckerberg has purchased 10 others in an apparent bid to create a kind of property buffer.
